Episodes.Title: Pilot (1)
Episodes.Plot: Bette Porter and Tina Kennard have been a couple for seven years, and they want to start a family. Their next-door neighbor, Tim Haspel, is excited that his girlfriend, a talented young writer named Jenny Schecter, is moving in with him. But soon mixing with Bette and Tina's circle of lesbian friends, Jenny learns that her midwest university education may not have prepared her for what she will learn about life, lust, and love in Los Angeles.
Episodes.ParentalRatingReason: R16 Offensive language and sex scenes
Episodes.GuestStars: Mark Houghton, Luciana Carro, Sandra-Jessica Couturier, Rekha Sharma, Peter Kelamis, Jacqueline Samuda, Jennifer Jasey, Mark Gibson, Bill Mondy, Dan Payne, Gina Holden, Bruno Verdoni, Leanne Adachi, Alonso Oyarzu

Episodes.Title: Let's Do It
Episodes.Plot: Tina tries to get over her concerns about the new sperm donor. Tim decides to throw a dinner party and invites Marina, making Jenny feel uncomfortable. Alice runs into her abusive ex-girlfriend. Dana has her eye on a chef, but is hesitant to make a move on her.
Episodes.ParentalRatingReason: R16 Offensive language and sex scenes
Episodes.GuestStars: Natasha Khadar,  Christine Anton,  Maya Massar,  Nahanni Arntzen,  Craig March,  Tara Hungerford,  Tammy Lynn Michaels,  Guinevere Turner

Episodes.Title: Longing
Episodes.Plot: Bette engages in a battle with the chairman of the gallery board who wants to close down the gallery. Alice rekindles her relationship with an ex-girlfriend, despite the objections of her friends. Jenny tries to deny her feelings for Marina, and Dana finally gets a date with Lara.
Episodes.ParentalRatingReason: R16 Offensive language and sex scenes
Episodes.GuestStars: Christine Anton,  Irene Karas,  Judith Maxie,  Bruce Harwood,  Marion Eisman,  Heidi Iro,  Camille Sullivan,  Audra Ricketts,  Anne Archer,  Julian Sands,  Devon Gummersall

Episodes.Title: Lies, Lies, Lies
Episodes.Plot: Jenny confides in her old college professor about her affair with Marina. Bette receives some delightful news. Dana's fears of being outed continue as she juggles between her tennis career and Lara. Alice's mother comes to stay with her daughter.
Episodes.ParentalRatingReason: R16 Offensive language and sex scenes

Episodes.Title: Lawfully
Episodes.Plot: Dana is invited to a dinner party for Subaru, who want to sponsor her tennis career, but Lara is hurt when Dana takes her male doubles partner instead of her. Meanwhile, Tim is shocked when he catches Marina and Jenny in a compromising position, Alice tries to sort out the problems with her mother, and Bette tells her father about Tina's pregnancy, but is upset by his reaction.
Episodes.ParentalRatingReason: R16 Drug use,sex scenes and offensive language

Episodes.Title: Losing It
Episodes.Plot: After arriving home, Tim starts to worry when he learns that Jenny has vanished. Bette travels to New York for an art opening and her relationship with Tina is put to the test. Back in Los Angeles, the sperm donor's girlfriend discovers a lonely Tina and starts to harass her.
Episodes.ParentalRatingReason: R16 Drug use,sex scenes and offensive language

Episodes.Title: L'Ennui
Episodes.Plot: Tina and Bette are stunned when their friends say their impending parenthood has made them boring. Jenny stays at Marina's when Tim throws her out but she is shocked to learn the truth about Marina's personal life. Dana rejects Lara as her sponsorship contract hangs on the line.
Episodes.ParentalRatingReason: R16 Drug use,sex scenes and offensive language

Episodes.Title: Listen Up
Episodes.Plot: When Jenny's old roommate (guest star Sarah Strange) from college comes to stay, Jenny decides to use the opportunity to reveal the details about her affair with Marina. Bette and Tina join a group in preparation for becoming parents, and Dana faces a tough time when she must come out to her conservative parents.

Episodes.Title: Luck, Next Time
Episodes.Plot: Shane gets the opportunity to style a high-profile client's hair, Bette and Tina receive some devastating news, Jenny goes to dinner with Marina and Francesca, and Alice decides that her relationship with Lisa is too complex.

Episodes.Title: Liberally
Episodes.Plot: Bette is worried about Tina when she throws herself into volunteer work, Marina and Francesca get into an argument, Alice thinks she may be pregnant by Lisa, and Dana and Jenny try to console each other.

Episodes.Title: Looking Back
Episodes.Plot: Tina, Jenny, Shane, Alice and Dana all share an eventful trip to Palm Springs. While on the road, they all share their "first love" stories. Back in Los Angeles, Bette hires Candace, an attractive carpenter, to handle the set-up of the "Provocations" exhibit opening at the gallery.

Episodes.Title: Locked Up
Episodes.Plot: After a riot at the gallery, the entire gang ends up in jail. Shane rejects Clea's affections, Jenny goes on a date, and Marina makes a move on Robin as she prepares for Drag King night at The Planet.
